info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lackawanna, southwestern Wayne and northeastern Luzerne Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pittston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Dunmore, Kingston, Plains, Old Forge, Pittston, Taylor, Moosic and Exeter. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 168 and 188. Interstate 84 between 1 and 17. Interstate 380 between 13 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy downpours are occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
